content: SPX-L core bit (inch) Ultimate core bit for coring in all types of concrete – for <2.5 kW tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti Equidist technology (1 3/8 diameter and above) – precisely positioned diamonds for unmatched drilling performance and constant drilling speeds over the entire life of the core bit Unique Hilti X-Change module system (2 to 8 diameter) enables easer core removal, faster stuck core bit recovery and on-site retipping using just a flat-tip screwdriver Save significant space and weight by replacing traditional core bits with a single barrel and multiple modules (X-Change module) Designed for the most challenging conditions, the core bit excels in concrete with a high rebar content Applications BI quick-release connection end for low power Hilti diamond drilling tools (less than 2.5 kW), Hilti BI shank BS (1-¼) universal connection end for Hilti and competition diamond drilling tools Rig-based wet coring in all types of concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: DD 120, DD 130, DD 150-U, DD 160 Base materials: Concrete Drilling Mode: Rig-mounted Technical Data | For use with | DD 120, DD 130, DD 150-U, DD 160 | Base materials | Concrete | Drilling Mode | Rig-mounted | Wet or dry operation | Wet | Laser welded segments | Yes | Connection end | BI (Hilti), BS (1-1/4 in), BT (5/8 in) | Working length | 17 in | Segment height | 10 mm ### ITEMS- 2159479 -
